insert.if:
insert into assess_gems
id, name, fsid, mem_id, create_time, update_time, showtag, mobile, cp, fs_type, bc_numtotal, username, aid, purview_map, dt_add, dt_edit, api_tag, idcard, moneycan_tag, upac_id, deltag, aid_ssm, imgurl, hometag, appkey, imgstep1_1, zx_result, imgstep2_1, imgstep3_1, imgstep4_1, icbc_id, ssbm,
values
#{id}, #{name}, #{fsid}, #{mem_id}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{showtag}, #{mobile}, #{cp}, #{fs_type}, #{bc_numtotal}, #{username}, #{aid}, #{purview_map}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{api_tag}, #{idcard}, #{moneycan_tag}, #{upac_id}, #{deltag}, #{aid_ssm}, #{imgurl}, #{hometag}, #{appkey}, #{imgstep1_1}, #{zx_result}, #{imgstep2_1}, #{imgstep3_1}, #{imgstep4_1}, #{icbc_id}, #{ssbm},

insert into assess_fs
id, name, state_id, city_id, zone_id, address, create_time, update_time, showtag, code_pre, fs_type, oem, oemimgurl, rec_id, support, sup_tel, namepy, apptitle, url_apk, dt_add, dt_edit, purview_map, mid_add, mid_edit, appid, appkey, ip, url_ios, zx_mbg, mg_tag, name_qy, deltag, books_id, ssm_gj_nowtype, ssm_id, super_queryarchives_tag, purview_map_kjs, mgicbc_tag, up_id, icbc_erp_tag, bank_id,
values
#{id}, #{name}, #{state_id}, #{city_id}, #{zone_id}, #{address}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{showtag}, #{code_pre}, #{fs_type}, #{oem}, #{oemimgurl}, #{rec_id}, #{support}, #{sup_tel}, #{namepy}, #{apptitle}, #{url_apk}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{purview_map}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{appid}, #{appkey}, #{ip}, #{url_ios}, #{zx_mbg}, #{mg_tag}, #{name_qy}, #{deltag}, #{books_id}, #{ssm_gj_nowtype}, #{ssm_id}, #{super_queryarchives_tag}, #{purview_map_kjs}, #{mgicbc_tag}, #{up_id}, #{icbc_erp_tag}, #{bank_id},

insert into assess_admin
id, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, deltag, isadmin, issupplier, showtag, username, userpass, tel, email, name, sex, logindt, logincode, limit_list, imgurl, stateid, cityid, eeid, note, wx_openid, gemsid, bc_title, fs_type, jgid, agpid, loginip, ssm_id, icbc_erp_tag, icbc_erp_fsid, upac_id, cp, erp_agpid, login_type,
values
#{id}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{deltag}, #{isadmin}, #{issupplier}, #{showtag}, #{username}, #{userpass}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{logindt}, #{logincode}, #{limit_list}, #{imgurl}, #{stateid}, #{cityid}, #{eeid}, #{note}, #{wx_openid}, #{gemsid}, #{bc_title}, #{fs_type}, #{jgid}, #{agpid}, #{loginip}, #{ssm_id}, #{icbc_erp_tag}, #{icbc_erp_fsid}, #{upac_id}, #{cp}, #{erp_agpid}, #{login_type},

insert into icbc_erp_admin_agp
id, name, dt_add, purview_map, showtag, mid_add, gems_fs_id, mid_edit, dt_edit, modal_tag, qx_type,
values
#{id}, #{name}, #{dt_add}, #{purview_map}, #{showtag}, #{mid_add}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_edit}, #{modal_tag}, #{qx_type},

select.if: select * from assess_gems where cp=#{cp} and fsid=#{fsid} and id!=#{id} and deltag=0 and fs_type=2 and showtag=1
select icbc.*, fs.name as fsname, gems.name as gemsname from kj_icbc icbc LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on fs.id=icbc.gems_fs_id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on gems.id=icbc.gems_id
select * from assess_admin where fs_type=2 and icbc_erp_tag>0 and fs.deltag=0

if.if: select g.cp as gemscp, g.mobile as mobile, f.name as fsname, admin.* from assess_admin admin LEFT JOIN assess_gems g on g.id=admin.gemsid LEFT JOIN assess_fs f on f.id=admin.icbc_erp_fsid where admin.deltag=0 and admin.fs_type=2 and admin.icbc_erp_fsid=#{fsid}

select.if: select * from assess_fs where name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select fs.*, admin.name as adminname, (select count(*) from assess_admin where icbc_erp_fsid=fs.id) as num from assess_fs fs LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin ON admin.id=fs.mid_add where fs.fs_type=2 and fs.mgicbc_tag>0 and fs.deltag=0
and fs.mid_add=#{mid_add}
select *, det.id as fs_details_id from assess_fs fs LEFT JOIN assess_fs_details det ON det.fs_id=fs.id where fs.id=#{id}

select admin.*, gems.name as gemsname, gems.mobile as mobile, gems.cp as gemscp, gems.imgurl as gemsimgurl, gems.ssbm as gemsssbm, fs.name as fsname, gems.idcard as idcard, fs.id as fsid from assess_admin admin LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems ON gems.id=admin.gemsid LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs ON fs.id=admin.icbc_erp_fsid where admin.id=#{id}

select admin.*, fs.icbc_erp_tag as erp_tag, fs.name as fsname, agp.purview_map as purview_map, skins.skins_name as skins_name, admin.gemsid as gems_id, gems.imgurl as gems_imgurl, gems.ssbm as gems_ssbm, fs.id as fs_id, fs.oemimgurl as fs_oemimgurl, agp.modal_tag as modal_tag, agp.qx_type as qx_type, fs_ds.zy_bank as fs_zy_bank, fs_ds.xt_name as fs_xt_name from assess_admin admin LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs ON fs.id=admin.icbc_erp_fsid LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems ON gems.id=admin.gemsid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_admin_agp agp ON agp.id=admin.erp_agpid LEFT JOIN erp_icbc_skins skins ON skins.admin_id=admin.id LEFT JOIN assess_fs_details fs_ds ON fs_ds.fs_id=admin.icbc_erp_fsid where admin.username=#{username} and admin.userpass=#{password} and admin.fs_type=2 and admin.showtag=1 and admin.deltag=0 and admin.icbc_erp_tag=1 and fs.showtag=1 and fs.deltag=0 limit 1
select * from assess_admin where username=#{username} limit 1

update.if: update erp_icbc_skins set skins_name=#{skins_name} where id=#{id}
